tta-seen til'ka āyātu al-qur'āni wakitābin mubīnin
hudan wabush'rā lil'mu'minīna
alladhīna yuqīmūna al-ṣalata wayu'tūna al-zakata wahum bil-ākhirati hum yūqinūna
inna alladhīna lā yu'minūna bil-ākhirati zayyannā lahum aʿmālahum fahum yaʿmahūna
ulāika alladhīna lahum sūu al-ʿadhābi wahum fī al-ākhirati humu al-akhsarūna
wa-innaka latulaqqā al-qur'āna min ladun ḥakīmin ʿalīmin
idh qāla mūsā li-ahlihi innī ānastu nāran saātīkum min'hā bikhabarin aw ātīkum bishihābin qabasin laʿallakum taṣṭalūna
falammā jāahā nūdiya an būrika man fī al-nāri waman ḥawlahā wasub'ḥāna al-lahi rabbi al-ʿālamīna
yāmūsā innahu anā al-lahu al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
wa-alqi ʿaṣāka falammā raāhā tahtazzu ka-annahā jānnun wallā mud'biran walam yuʿaqqib yāmūsā lā takhaf innī lā yakhāfu ladayya al-mur'salūna
illā man ẓalama thumma baddala ḥus'nan baʿda sūin fa-innī ghafūrun raḥīmun
wa-adkhil yadaka fī jaybika takhruj bayḍāa min ghayri sūin fī tis'ʿi āyātin ilā fir'ʿawna waqawmihi innahum kānū qawman fāsiqīna
falammā jāathum āyātunā mub'ṣiratan qālū hādhā siḥ'run mubīnun
wajaḥadū bihā wa-is'tayqanathā anfusuhum ẓul'man waʿuluwwan fa-unẓur kayfa kāna ʿāqibatu al-muf'sidīna
walaqad ātaynā dāwūda wasulaymāna ʿil'man waqālā al-ḥamdu lillahi alladhī faḍḍalanā ʿalā kathīrin min ʿibādihi al-mu'minīna
wawaritha sulaymānu dāwūda waqāla yāayyuhā al-nāsu ʿullim'nā manṭiqa al-ṭayri waūtīnā min kulli shayin inna hādhā lahuwa al-faḍlu al-mubīnu
waḥushira lisulaymāna junūduhu mina al-jini wal-insi wal-ṭayri fahum yūzaʿūna
ḥattā idhā ataw ʿalā wādi al-namli qālat namlatun yāayyuhā al-namlu ud'khulū masākinakum lā yaḥṭimannakum sulaymānu wajunūduhu wahum lā yashʿurūna
fatabassama ḍāḥikan min qawlihā waqāla rabbi awziʿ'nī an ashkura niʿ'mataka allatī anʿamta ʿalayya waʿalā wālidayya wa-an aʿmala ṣāliḥan tarḍāhu wa-adkhil'nī biraḥmatika fī ʿibādika al-ṣāliḥīna
watafaqqada al-ṭayra faqāla mā liya lā arā al-hud'huda am kāna mina al-ghāibīna
la-uʿadhibannahu ʿadhāban shadīdan aw laādh'baḥannahu aw layatiyannī bisul'ṭānin mubīnin
famakatha ghayra baʿīdin faqāla aḥaṭtu bimā lam tuḥiṭ bihi waji'tuka min saba-in binaba-in yaqīnin
innī wajadttu im'ra-atan tamlikuhum waūtiyat min kulli shayin walahā ʿarshun ʿaẓīmun
wajadttuhā waqawmahā yasjudūna lilshamsi min dūni al-lahi wazayyana lahumu al-shayṭānu aʿmālahum faṣaddahum ʿani al-sabīli fahum lā yahtadūna
allā yasjudū lillahi alladhī yukh'riju al-khaba-a fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wayaʿlamu mā tukh'fūna wamā tuʿ'linūna
al-lahu lā ilāha illā huwa rabbu al-ʿarshi al-ʿaẓīmi
qāla sananẓuru aṣadaqta am kunta mina al-kādhibīna
idh'hab bikitābī hādhā fa-alqih ilayhim thumma tawalla ʿanhum fa-unẓur mādhā yarjiʿūna
qālat yāayyuhā al-mala-u innī ul'qiya ilayya kitābun karīmun
innahu min sulaymāna wa-innahu bis'mi al-lahi al-raḥmāni al-raḥīmi
allā taʿlū ʿalayya watūnī mus'limīna
qālat yāayyuhā al-mala-u aftūnī fī amrī mā kuntu qāṭiʿatan amran ḥattā tashhadūni
qālū naḥnu ulū quwwatin wa-ulū basin shadīdin wal-amru ilayki fa-unẓurī mādhā tamurīna
qālat inna al-mulūka idhā dakhalū qaryatan afsadūhā wajaʿalū aʿizzata ahlihā adhillatan wakadhālika yafʿalūna
wa-innī mur'silatun ilayhim bihadiyyatin fanāẓiratun bima yarjiʿu al-mur'salūna
falammā jāa sulaymāna qāla atumiddūnani bimālin famā ātāniya al-lahu khayrun mimmā ātākum bal antum bihadiyyatikum tafraḥūna
ir'jiʿ ilayhim falanatiyannahum bijunūdin lā qibala lahum bihā walanukh'rijannahum min'hā adhillatan wahum ṣāghirūna
qāla yāayyuhā al-mala-u ayyukum yatīnī biʿarshihā qabla an yatūnī mus'limīna
qāla ʿif'rītun mina al-jini anā ātīka bihi qabla an taqūma min maqāmika wa-innī ʿalayhi laqawiyyun amīnun

qāla alladhī ʿindahu ʿil'mun mina al-kitābi anā ātīka bihi qabla an yartadda ilayka ṭarfuka falammā raāhu mus'taqirran ʿindahu qāla hādhā min faḍli rabbī liyabluwanī a-ashkuru am akfuru waman shakara fa-innamā yashkuru linafsihi waman kafara fa-inna rabbī ghaniyyun karīmun
qāla nakkirū lahā ʿarshahā nanẓur atahtadī am takūnu mina alladhīna lā yahtadūna
falammā jāat qīla ahākadhā ʿarshuki qālat ka-annahu huwa waūtīnā al-ʿil'ma min qablihā wakunnā mus'limīna
waṣaddahā mā kānat taʿbudu min dūni al-lahi innahā kānat min qawmin kāfirīna

qīla lahā ud'khulī al-ṣarḥa falammā ra-athu ḥasibathu lujjatan wakashafat ʿan sāqayhā qāla innahu ṣarḥun mumarradun min qawārīra qālat rabbi innī ẓalamtu nafsī wa-aslamtu maʿa sulaymāna lillahi rabbi al-ʿālamīna
walaqad arsalnā ilā thamūda akhāhum ṣāliḥan ani uʿ'budū al-laha fa-idhā hum farīqāni yakhtaṣimūna
qāla yāqawmi lima tastaʿjilūna bil-sayi-ati qabla al-ḥasanati lawlā tastaghfirūna al-laha laʿallakum tur'ḥamūna
qālū iṭṭayyarnā bika wabiman maʿaka qāla ṭāirukum ʿinda al-lahi bal antum qawmun tuf'tanūna
wakāna fī al-madīnati tis'ʿatu rahṭin yuf'sidūna fī al-arḍi walā yuṣ'liḥūna
qālū taqāsamū bil-lahi lanubayyitannahu wa-ahlahu thumma lanaqūlanna liwaliyyihi mā shahid'nā mahlika ahlihi wa-innā laṣādiqūna
wamakarū makran wamakarnā makran wahum lā yashʿurūna
fa-unẓur kayfa kāna ʿāqibatu makrihim annā dammarnāhum waqawmahum ajmaʿīna
fatil'ka buyūtuhum khāwiyatan bimā ẓalamū inna fī dhālika laāyatan liqawmin yaʿlamūna
wa-anjaynā alladhīna āmanū wakānū yattaqūna
walūṭan idh qāla liqawmihi atatūna al-fāḥishata wa-antum tub'ṣirūna
a-innakum latatūna al-rijāla shahwatan min dūni al-nisāi bal antum qawmun tajhalūna
famā kāna jawāba qawmihi illā an qālū akhrijū āla lūṭin min qaryatikum innahum unāsun yataṭahharūna
fa-anjaynāhu wa-ahlahu illā im'ra-atahu qaddarnāhā mina al-ghābirīna
wa-amṭarnā ʿalayhim maṭaran fasāa maṭaru al-mundharīna
quli al-ḥamdu lillahi wasalāmun ʿalā ʿibādihi alladhīna iṣ'ṭafā āllahu khayrun ammā yush'rikūna
amman khalaqa al-samāwāti wal-arḍa wa-anzala lakum mina al-samāi māan fa-anbatnā bihi ḥadāiqa dhāta bahjatin mā kāna lakum an tunbitū shajarahā a-ilāhun maʿa al-lahi bal hum qawmun yaʿdilūna
amman jaʿala al-arḍa qarāran wajaʿala khilālahā anhāran wajaʿala lahā rawāsiya wajaʿala bayna al-baḥrayni ḥājizan a-ilāhun maʿa al-lahi bal aktharuhum lā yaʿlamūna
amman yujību al-muḍ'ṭara idhā daʿāhu wayakshifu al-sūa wayajʿalukum khulafāa al-arḍi a-ilāhun maʿa al-lahi qalīlan mā tadhakkarūna
amman yahdīkum fī ẓulumāti al-bari wal-baḥri waman yur'silu al-riyāḥa bush'ran bayna yaday raḥmatihi a-ilāhun maʿa al-lahi taʿālā al-lahu ʿammā yush'rikūna
amman yabda-u al-khalqa thumma yuʿīduhu waman yarzuqukum mina al-samāi wal-arḍi a-ilāhun maʿa al-lahi qul hātū bur'hānakum in kuntum ṣādiqīna
qul lā yaʿlamu man fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi al-ghayba illā al-lahu wamā yashʿurūna ayyāna yub'ʿathūna
bali iddāraka ʿil'muhum fī al-ākhirati bal hum fī shakkin min'hā bal hum min'hā ʿamūna
waqāla alladhīna kafarū a-idhā kunnā turāban waābāunā a-innā lamukh'rajūna
laqad wuʿid'nā hādhā naḥnu waābāunā min qablu in hādhā illā asāṭīru al-awalīna
qul sīrū fī al-arḍi fa-unẓurū kayfa kāna ʿāqibatu al-muj'rimīna
walā taḥzan ʿalayhim walā takun fī ḍayqin mimmā yamkurūna
wayaqūlūna matā hādhā al-waʿdu in kuntum ṣādiqīna
qul ʿasā an yakūna radifa lakum baʿḍu alladhī tastaʿjilūna
wa-inna rabbaka ladhū faḍlin ʿalā al-nāsi walākinna aktharahum lā yashkurūna
wa-inna rabbaka layaʿlamu mā tukinnu ṣudūruhum wamā yuʿ'linūna
wamā min ghāibatin fī al-samāi wal-arḍi illā fī kitābin mubīnin
inna hādhā al-qur'āna yaquṣṣu ʿalā banī is'rāīla akthara alladhī hum fīhi yakhtalifūna
wa-innahu lahudan waraḥmatun lil'mu'minīna
inna rabbaka yaqḍī baynahum biḥuk'mihi wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ʿalīmu
fatawakkal ʿalā al-lahi innaka ʿalā al-ḥaqi al-mubīni
innaka lā tus'miʿu al-mawtā walā tus'miʿu al-ṣuma al-duʿāa idhā wallaw mud'birīna
wamā anta bihādī al-ʿum'yi ʿan ḍalālatihim in tus'miʿu illā man yu'minu biāyātinā fahum mus'limūna
wa-idhā waqaʿa al-qawlu ʿalayhim akhrajnā lahum dābbatan mina al-arḍi tukallimuhum anna al-nāsa kānū biāyātinā lā yūqinūna
wayawma naḥshuru min kulli ummatin fawjan mimman yukadhibu biāyātinā fahum yūzaʿūna
ḥattā idhā jāū qāla akadhabtum biāyātī walam tuḥīṭū bihā ʿil'man ammādhā kuntum taʿmalūna
wawaqaʿa al-qawlu ʿalayhim bimā ẓalamū fahum lā yanṭiqūna
alam yaraw annā jaʿalnā al-layla liyaskunū fīhi wal-nahāra mub'ṣiran inna fī dhālika laāyātin liqawmin yu'minūna
wayawma yunfakhu fī al-ṣūri fafaziʿa man fī al-samāwāti waman fī al-arḍi illā man shāa al-lahu wakullun atawhu dākhirīna
watarā al-jibāla taḥsabuhā jāmidatan wahiya tamurru marra al-saḥābi ṣun'ʿa al-lahi alladhī atqana kulla shayin innahu khabīrun bimā tafʿalūna
man jāa bil-ḥasanati falahu khayrun min'hā wahum min fazaʿin yawma-idhin āminūna
waman jāa bil-sayi-ati fakubbat wujūhuhum fī al-nāri hal tuj'zawna illā mā kuntum taʿmalūna
innamā umir'tu an aʿbuda rabba hādhihi al-baldati alladhī ḥarramahā walahu kullu shayin wa-umir'tu an akūna mina al-mus'limīna
wa-an atluwā al-qur'āna famani ih'tadā fa-innamā yahtadī linafsihi waman ḍalla faqul innamā anā mina al-mundhirīna
waquli al-ḥamdu lillahi sayurīkum āyātihi fataʿrifūnahā wamā rabbuka bighāfilin ʿammā taʿmalūna
